name: Chamber of Elements
description:
CHAMBER OF ELEMENTS

Combine 50+ elements in turn-based RPG combat

(ALPHA DEMO)

This is my first game project, feedback / bug reports are greatly appreciated

MENU CONTROLS

Up/down: Change option

Space/Enter: Select option

R: Restart

- For instructions on how to play the game, visit "How to play" in the main menu screen

Future plans:

- Custom character / environment art

- Roguelite progression with perk system, multiple zones with custom bosses/enemies

- More elements, more combinations, and unique elements

- Story elements, with non-combat puzzle type screens

- Companion system with unique perks & elements
